message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take this small share and let's be done with it.
I'll take the majority, but I'll let you have a small share. It's a fair deal.
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I won't be swayed any further.
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving in completely. It's time for you to make a serious offer.
